title: Response time on a ticket for a hacked account
body:
Just trying to follow up on a ticket for support I filed Monday night at 11:20 EST.  My main account is no longer associated with my email address, so I cannot access or change the password for this account.  I obviously didn't authorize this, and I'd very much like to get access to this account back, as it was created in 2011-2012, and has hundreds (if not over $1000) sunk into it with Champ and skin purchases.  

I understand there is a queue, and you guys are likely busy, but it's been over 36 hours and I don't even have a response.  Can I get some feedback or some reassurance that someone is at least working on this?

replies.body:
I'm roughly in the same boat ("the account was placed under a protective ban after we noticed some unusual login activity.") and over the $1k mark (which shouldn't matter). It seems to take 24-36 hours per reply so you're in for the long haul.

You can use this to check how much you've spent:
https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/data
Our volume might be a bit higher for our account team, but a specialist will get back to you as soon as they can.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on the status for you!
